scripts.build: yarn license:generate:admin && aspida -c config/aspida.config.js && run-s build:server build:admin build:front build:lock
scripts.license:check:admin: npm_config_yes=true npx license-checker --excludePrivatePackages --production --start apps/admin --onlyAllow 'MIT; Apache-2.0; Apache 2.0; ISC; BSD-3-Clause; BSD-2-Clause; 0BSD; CC-BY-4.0; CC0-1.0; MPL-2.0;'
scripts.license:check:front: npm_config_yes=true npx license-checker --excludePrivatePackages --production --start apps/front --onlyAllow 'MIT; Apache-2.0; Apache 2.0; ISC; BSD-3-Clause; BSD-2-Clause; 0BSD; CC-BY-4.0; CC0-1.0; MPL-2.0;'
scripts.license:check:lock: npm_config_yes=true npx license-checker --excludePrivatePackages --production --start apps/lock --onlyAllow 'MIT; Apache-2.0; Apache 2.0; ISC; BSD-3-Clause; BSD-2-Clause; 0BSD; CC-BY-4.0; CC0-1.0; MPL-2.0;'
scripts.license:check:server: npm_config_yes=true npx license-checker --excludePrivatePackages --production --start apps/server --onlyAllow 'MIT; Apache-2.0; Apache 2.0; ISC; BSD-3-Clause; BSD-2-Clause; 0BSD; CC-BY-4.0; CC0-1.0; MPL-2.0;'
scripts.license:generate:admin: npm_config_yes=true npx license-checker --excludePrivatePackages --production --start apps/admin --json --customPath config/license-format.json > apps/admin/license.json
scripts.license:generate:front: npm_config_yes=true npx license-checker --excludePrivatePackages --production --start apps/front --json --customPath config/license-format.json > apps/front/license.json
scripts.license:generate:lock: npm_config_yes=true npx license-checker --excludePrivatePackages --production --start apps/lock --json --customPath config/license-format.json > apps/lock/license.json
scripts.license:generate:server: npm_config_yes=true npx license-checker --excludePrivatePackages --production --start apps/server --json --customPath config/license-format.json > apps/server/license.json
scripts.prepare:cover: yarn setup:install && yarn setup:config && yarn workspace @frourio-demo/server migrate:dev && yarn workspace @frourio-demo/server frourio && aspida -c config/aspida.config.js && yarn license:generate:admin
scripts.prepare:pages: yarn setup:install && yarn setup:config && yarn workspace @frourio-demo/server build:prisma && aspida -c config/aspida.config.js && yarn license:generate
scripts.prepare:typecheck: yarn setup:install && yarn setup:config && yarn workspace @frourio-demo/server build:prisma && yarn license:generate:admin
scripts.prepare:server: yarn setup:install && yarn workspace @frourio-demo/server setup && yarn build:server
scripts.setup: yarn setup:install && yarn setup:server && yarn setup:admin && yarn setup:lock
scripts.test: yarn lint && yarn typecheck && yarn cover
scripts.typecheck: yarn build:types && tsc --noEmit -p apps/admin && tsc --noEmit -p apps/front && tsc --noEmit -p apps/lock && tsc --noEmit -p apps/server && tsc --noEmit -p shared/constants && tsc --noEmit -p shared/types && tsc --noEmit -p shared/utils
scripts.update: yarn update:core && yarn workspaces run update && yarn install && yarn upgrade && yarn audit
